name: Allegiant Air MD-83 takeoff from Calgary ᴴᴰ
description:
FINALLY! It's been over half a year since I've seen a Mad Dog... Unlike 99carnot who sees them every time he goes spotting. Anyway, here's an Allegiant Air MD-80 departing Calgary, filmed from the new spot that many of you seem to like ;) Hope you enjoy!

Thanks for watching! Please comment, rate, and subscribe!
_____________________________________________________

FLIGHT INFO
FlightAware: http://flightaware.com/live/flight/N877GA
Aircraft registration: N877GA
Callsign: Allegiant 8314
Runway used: 35L
